price: So that Allah may recompense every soul for what it did. Allah is swift in reckoning.
arabic: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱللَّهُ كُلَّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا كَسَبَتۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
